Body:
for trend_func in [None, trend]:
    for Model in self.cov_models:
        for dim in self.dims:
            model = Model(dim=dim, var=5, len_scale=10, anis=[0.9, 0.8],
                angles=[2, 1, 0.5])
            ordinary = krige.Ordinary(model, self.cond_pos[:dim], self.
                cond_val, trend_func)
            field_1, __ = ordinary.unstructured(self.grids[dim - 1])
            field_1 = field_1.reshape(self.grid_shape[:dim])
            field_2, __ = ordinary.structured(self.pos[:dim])
            self.assertAlmostEqual(np.max(np.abs(field_1 - field_2)), 0.0,
                places=2)
            for i, val in enumerate(self.cond_val):
                self.assertAlmostEqual(field_1[self.data_idx[:dim]][i], val,
                    places=2)
